'''Xiangling's Handwritten Notes''' is a Quest Item given by [[Xiangling]] after speaking to her at the southwest of [[Qingce Village]], during "[[The Gourmet Supremos: Breakthrough Thinking]]" [[Commission]]. The notes are to be passed on to [[Xudong]].
